author: Grieve
excerpt: Per the Free Cooper Union Facebook page:After seven days in the Peter Cooper Suite, the Students for a Free Cooper Union have left on their own accord, holding a press conference outside the…
content:
Per the Free Cooper Union Facebook page:
After seven days in the Peter Cooper Suite, the Students for a Free Cooper Union have left on their own accord, holding a press conference outside the Foundation Building and dancing while Reverend Billy And The Stop Shopping Gospel Choir blesses FREE EDUCATION TO ALL!

The Huffington Post has more on story here. DNAinfo covered the Citywide Student/Faculty Rally on Saturday here.

The 11 students also distributed a holiday card...


Previously.
title: Report: Cooper Union students end week-long occupation of 8th-floor suite
